segments.text: I notice the stool is about to tip over, and it’s making me so anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching so high, and the stool is barely holding him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl watching him, and she looks so worried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is just making everything worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this; it’s too stressful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s going to collapse any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy has ever fallen before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone stops him before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
